body.p: 1. Son of Assir and a descendant of Levi through Kohath’s line. He was an ancestor of Heman, one of David’s musicians, and the father of Uriel and Zephaniah (1 Chr 6:24, 37).
2. Ephraimite, the son of Bered and the father of Eleadah (1 Chr 7:20).
3. Ephraimite, the son of Eleadah and the father of Zabad (1 Chr 7:20).
